page.title: 11The Royal Visit
page.content: On Saturday June 1st 1985{Prince {Charles}and the{Royal Regiment of {Wales}visited Llandovery to receive the{Freedom ofthe Borough of Dinefwr on behalf of the regiment to which he is Colonel in Chief.He{arrived at the {College}by helicopter where he had a reception with the Warden.He then went to the{Town Hall for the freedom {ceremony.}The speaches were relayed by loud speakers to those waiting outside .After the ceremony Prince Charles came out and spoke to many of the Brownies,Cubs,Guides,Scouts,Rangers and people awaiting him.He then went on a{walkabout to the Castle Grounds where the Royal Regiment were on parade and guests assembled in stands.After the Ceremony at the Castle the Prince attended a{luncheon {at the College.
